p.em: The Ministry’s political leadership consists of the minister, a state secretary and a political adviser. The most senior official in the Ministry is the secretary general, who assists and advises the minister and coordinates the work of the Ministry.

body.p: The Ministry of Transport and Communications consists of six departments:

list.p: Department of Strategy, Economic Affairs and Administration
Department of Civil Aviation, Postal Services and Telecommunications
Department of Public Roads and Traffic Safety
Department of Public and Rail Transport
Department of Coastal Management and Marine Environment
